description: Point locations of confirmed Merremia peltata (invasive vine) observations on Efate Island, collected by DEPC field officers during February 2026. Dataset includes coverage density, threat assessment, and control status for each site.
custodianAgency: Department of Environment Protection and Conservation (DEPC)
dataSource: Field surveys conducted by DEPC field officers using mobile PWA application
methodologySummary: Ground-based field observations using GPS-enabled mobile devices. Officers recorded location, estimated coverage area, took geotagged photographs, and assessed threat level. Data collected following standardized DEPC field protocols.
dataLimitations: Coverage may be incomplete in remote or inaccessible areas. Density estimates are visual approximations. Dataset represents observed locations only, not comprehensive island-wide mapping. GPS accuracy ±5-15m depending on canopy cover.
citations: Department of Environment Protection and Conservation. (2026). Merremia Peltata Distribution - Efate Island 2026. Government of Vanuatu.
